name: Luneia the Soothsayer
description:
Play as Luneia the Soothsayer as you attempt to solve the mystery of the foggy Town of Salem. Interact with people and wield your ability to See into the past, present or future of their lives as a wandering fortune teller.

Made for the (You) RPGmaker Jam #3.  It was supposed to have battles but I ended up not having the time to put in any at all!  Game length is around 1-2 hours.

Hope you enjoyed it!

v1.1 update: fixed gamecrashing bug caused by missing explosion2 image

v1.2 update: added credits and other minor fixes
